name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text:
On Play: Give your leader or one of your characters up to one rested Don!
When Attacking: If you have a cost 8 or greater character in play, draw one card then discard one card from your hand.

effect.text: Give your leader or one of your characters up to one rested Don!
If you have a cost 8 or greater character in play, draw one card then discard one card from your hand.
conditions: cost 8 or greater character in play
